plugin.name: core
plugin.description: Core Plugin is the basic plugin which is the basis of all plugins provided by Anyframe, and consists of sample code to guide how to use Spring MVC, Spring, etc. and reference libraries to use these open sources.

plugin.name: datasource
plugin.description: Datasource Plugin is the basic plugin which is the basis of all plugins provided by Anyframe, and consists of the reference libraries needed to use Apache Commons DBCP Datasource.

plugin.name: logging
plugin.description: Logging Plugin is the basic plugin which is the basis of all plugins provided by Anyframe, and consists of the reference libraries needed to use logging service.

plugin.name: spring
plugin.description: Spring Plugin is the basic plugin which is the basis of all plugins provided by Anyframe, and consists of the reference libraries needed to use Spring framework.
